name: carina-blog-generator-backend
description: AI-powered blog article generator backend Cloud Function

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy generateReport --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point app --region us-central1 --set-env-vars GCP_PROJECT=carinas-article-genetation,GEMINI_MODEL=gemini-2.5-flash,GEMINI_MAX_TOKENS=24000 --service-account carinas-article-genetation@appspot.gserviceaccount.com --source=. --timeout=540s
